info.description:
========================
L10n Br Purchase Request
========================

.. !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
   !! This file is generated by oca-gen-addon-readme !!
   !! changes will be overwritten.                   !!
   !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

.. |badge1| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/maturity-Beta-yellow.png
    :target: https://odoo-community.org/page/development-status
    :alt: Beta
.. |badge2| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/licence-AGPL--3-blue.png
    :target: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/agpl-3.0-standalone.html
    :alt: License: AGPL-3
.. |badge3| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/github-OCA%2Fl10n--brazil-lightgray.png?logo=github
    :target: https://github.com/OCA/l10n-brazil/tree/12.0/l10n_br_purchase_request
    :alt: OCA/l10n-brazil
.. |badge4| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/weblate-Translate%20me-F47D42.png
    :target: https://translation.odoo-community.org/projects/l10n-brazil-12-0/l10n-brazil-12-0-l10n_br_purchase_request
    :alt: Translate me on Weblate
.. |badge5| image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/runbot-Try%20me-875A7B.png
    :target: https://runbot.odoo-community.org/runbot/124/12.0
    :alt: Try me on Runbot

|badge1| |badge2| |badge3| |badge4| |badge5| 

This module extends the Odoo Purchase Request module to adapt it to the Brazilian needs, with this module you have tax data for collection and generation of fiscal documents (NF-e, NFS-e, CF-e, NFC-e and others), calculation Brazilian taxes and contributions (municipal, state and federal).

**Table of contents**

.. contents::
   :local:

Installation
============

This module depends on:

* l10n_br_purchase
* purchase_request

Configuration
=============

No configuration required.

Usage
=====

To use this module, you need to:

#. Go to Purchase Request
#. Create or select a Purchase Request
#. Approve the Purchase Request
#. Create RFQ

Bug Tracker
===========

Bugs are tracked on `GitHub Issues <https://github.com/OCA/l10n-brazil/issues>`_.
In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported.
If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed
`feedback <https://github.com/OCA/l10n-brazil/issues/new?body=module:%20l10n_br_purchase_request%0Aversion:%2012.0%0A%0A**Steps%20to%20reproduce**%0A-%20...%0A%0A**Current%20behavior**%0A%0A**Expected%20behavior**>`_.

Do not contact contributors directly about support or help with technical issues.
